mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_num, order_name, order_status, receive_name, receive_post, receive_address1, receive_address2, receive_phone, notice, order_date, refund_status, mem_num, order_price) VALUES ( #{order_num}, #{order_name}, #{order_status}, #{receive_name}, #{receive_post}, #{receive_address1}, #{receive_address2}, #{receive_phone}, #{notice}, SYSDATE, #{refund_status}, #{mem_num}, #{order_price})
